unnormalised: Employee retention is crucial for companies in India like TCS. High attrition impacts project timelines and training costs. Offering competitive salaries (e.g., R. 5 lakhs+) is a start. Consider initiatives like flexible timings post-Diwali (e.g., starting 06/11/2024) and skill development programs at IIM Ahmedabad. Mentorship by senior colleagues (e.g., Mr. Sharma) from 10:00 hrs to 11:00 hrs on Fridays can also help. Let's aim for better retention by 15/08/2025.
